mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, George Washington Parke Custis to Simon Lomers, Esq., 1800 (?) February 27
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Custis, George Washington Parke, 1781-1857
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Correspondence from George Washington Parke Custis requesting a copy of a survey & plat of parcel of land he wants to sell [200 acres]. Date on original catalog card appears 1800 (?) Feb. 27. A note on the reverse, in an unknown hand, explains this document was saved as a relic. Autograph letter signed, 1 page. Note the accession number [MS-2375] written in pencil on verso is incorrect - item has been renumbered as RM-361 ; MS-3075.
